chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < card s)%nat

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
ndN = fix ndN (m : fmap) : nat := match m with | V => 0%nat | I m0 x _ _ => if exd_dec m0 x then ndN m0 else (1 + ndN m0)%nat | L m0 _ _ _ => ndN m0 end : fmap -> nat
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
Iter_rem_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Fix Rs_wf (fun _ : set => set) (Iter_rem_F m z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Q2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < card s)%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
LR2 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)
LQ1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= card s)%nat
card_rem_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card s < ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < ndN m)%nat
R2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
Q1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= card s)%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
card_rem_aux_bis : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= ndN m)%nat
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
P2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (card s < ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < ndN m)%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
Iter_upb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem_aux m z s))%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> nat
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), (card (Ds s z) <= card s)%nat
P2_bis = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= ndN m)%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
R1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z) : fmap -> dart -> nat -> set -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _]
Iter_orb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem_aux m z s) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)

```coq
intros m z s H.
assert (card s < ndN m \/ card s = ndN m \/ card s > ndN m) as [H1 | [H2 | H3]] by omega.
- apply card_rem_aux in H1. auto.
- rewrite <- H2 in *. apply LQ1.
- exfalso. apply LR2 in H. auto.
Qed.```
